metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5883 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Flash component infrastructure in YUI 2.8.0 through 2.9.0, as used in Bugzilla 3.7.x and 4.0.x before 4.0.9, 4.1.x and 4.2.x before 4.2.4, and 4.3.x and 4.4.x before 4.4rc1, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to swfstore.swf, a similar issue to CVE-2010-4209.

notes.Note: jdstrand> maas uses an embedded copy of yui 3.4.1 in 12.04 and portions of yui3 in 12.10 and higher per upstream, yui3 not affected

criterions.comment: yui: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
